text:
01 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg Becky G is not hiding her devotion to her beau, Argentinean soccer star Sebastian Lletget. The "Mayores" singer welcomed the new year with her boyfriend and her family at a cozy cabin, where the couple shared this romantic kiss.

02 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg On New Year's Day, she shared this sweet photo of her loved ones:"Although I woke up extremely sick, there is no other place and no other group of people I’d rather be with to bring in the new year. This is my core. I love them with my whole heart," she captioned the pic.

03 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg On her love's birthday, Sept. 3, she celebrated him in a sweet post: "Happy birthday to my person! I'm happy you were born. I'm beyond grateful to be a part of your journey in life. I can't thank god enough for bringing our paths together."

04 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg Her birthday wishes continued with another caption and frame-worthy snap: "I'm so sad that I can't be with you on your special day but I promise we will celebrate when we both get back home! I love you! Hope you have a special day. I wish you many more years of health, positivity, strength, success, and most importantly, happiness."

05 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg She shared this tender embrace between the two on June 25, writing: "I got your back. You got mine. It's pretty simple."

06 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg She posted this image of the two flaunting their sexy bods on a bright summer day, June 3: "Just me and my person," her caption reads. "Through the highs and lows he manages to hold it down for me. I'm grateful. I like doing life with you. You're real."

07 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg The singer posted these cute pics on Mar. 6 and wrote: "Missing my better half."

08 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg The petite brunette gave a shout out to the athlete on Oct. 16 of 2016 with this adorable shot and message: "Have a great game today baby!"

09 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg Lletget was her date to the Grammy Awards on Feb. 12 last last year:. "After Grammy business with my amor," she wrote.

10 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg While watching her soccer stud's game on TV on Oct. 26 of 2016, Becky donned his sports jersey and cheered him on, after lighting candles to her Guardian Angel and the Virgin of Guadalupe.

11 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg The singer, here with Lletget vacationing in California on July 3 of 2016, told E! News: “When you have someone that is your best friend, your family, your lover, your homie and all in one, it’s like, ‘Wow.’ You don’t have to think about it, it doesn’t take much effort, you know what I mean? It’s just that support and it feels really beautiful.”

12 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg Becky shared this sweet snap of her and her prince at Disneyland on July 1 of 2016: "Happiest place on earth with the one that makes me the happiest," to which Lletget replied: "My love, you make me so happy."

13 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckyg On June 16 of 2016 the duo exchanged a tender kiss. "Real one. I'm a lucky woman," she captioned the pic.

14 of 15 Instagram/ @iambeckg The pair arrived hand in hand at the American Music Awards in 2016. "Thank you to my man for standing by my side," she captioned the pic.
authors: Lena Hansen Is A Senior Writer At People.
title: Becky G and Boyfriend Sebastian Lletget's Most Romantic Moments on Instagram

meta_data.description: Singer Becky G and boyfriend, Argentinean soccer stud Sebastian Lletget, share their love in pictures and posts on Instagram. See 11 of their sweetest moments together.
meta_data.sailthru.author: Lena Hansen
